Articles.Content:
This is based on the two-seat heavy fighter flown by the Kilrathi in "Wing Commander III: Heart of the Tiger".  When I played the game, the Vaktoths were a complete pain to fight...

I had to put some RCS tanks in the front just to keep the center of mass close to the center of lift.

 

Craft file: http://kerbalx.com/pheeph/Vaktoth.craft
Whoa that looks really cool! look at my a-10 warthog if you like fighter jets.
